meanings.definition: A type of fish known for its ability to inflate itself when threatened.
meanings.sent1: The blowfish puffed up to scare away the predator.
meanings.sent2: I saw a blowfish at the aquarium puffing itself up.
meanings.sent3: Why did the blowfish bring a pump to the ocean? To inflate its ego!
meanings.sent4: Her pride swelled like a blowfish trying to ward off danger.
meanings.sent5: The blowfish looked like a spiky balloon underwater.

meanings.definition: A Japanese delicacy made from the meat of the blowfish.
meanings.sent1: The blowfish dish was a special treat at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: I tried blowfish sushi for the first time and loved it.
meanings.sent3: Why did the blowfish go to culinary school? To become a sushi chef!
meanings.sent4: The blowfish dish was as exquisite as a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: The blowfish delicacy melted in my mouth with a burst of flavor.

meanings.definition: A type of encryption algorithm used to secure data.
meanings.sent1: The blowfish encryption kept the information safe from hackers.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to use blowfish to protect my files online.
meanings.sent3: Why did the blowfish become a computer programmer? To encrypt all its secrets!
meanings.sent4: The blowfish algorithm guarded the data like a vigilant sentinel.
meanings.sent5: The blowfish encryption wrapped the data in a shield of security.
